long_description: The REI Expandable Packing Cube Set includes a medium and large cube to help you organize and neatly fit more contents into your luggage. Made of light and durable ripstop nylon, each cube includes a mesh window that lets you see inside. Zipper expands cube size: large (14 x 10 x 3 in. to 14 x 10 x 5.5 in.); medium (10 x 7 x 3 in. to 10 x 7 x 5.5 in.). For added convenience, each cube in the REI Expandable Packing Cube Set includes a carrying handle.
short_description: The REI Expandable Packing Cube Set includes a medium and large cube to help you organize and neatly fit more contents into your luggage.
